name: Quicksilver Siege Orb
description: A small, resilient construct that can shift between a disk and orb form, made of quicksilver-like material.
memorable: Its ability to avoid damage from bludgeoning attacks and manipulate its form makes it a unique combatant.
goals: To disrupt enemy formations and remain a mobile threat in combat.
relations: Often encountered in association with other constructs or as guardians of locations.
environment: Can be found in various environments where constructs are created, such as laboratories or fortresses.
strengths: High Dexterity provides excellent agility, good stealth capabilities, and versatility in combat forms.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage and possesses very low Intelligence and Charisma scores.
attacks: Can make multiple attacks with its Disk Blade or Slam, dealing slashing and bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Slashing Run ability allows it to inflict heavy slashing damage while maneuvering through enemies.
senses: Has passive perception of 15, allowing it to notice hidden or obscured foes effectively.
skills: With a Stealth skill bonus of +8, it excels at remaining hidden and ambushing targets.
additional_information: Immunities to several conditions such as frightened and poisoned.
Can fly without provoking opportunity attacks through its Flyby ability.
Maintains the same statistics in both its orb and disk forms.
Immunity to bludgeoning damage due to its Bludgeoning Bounce ability.
Practices a unique form of mobility with shape-shifting capabilities.
test_queries: agile construct with mobility and stealth
small quicksilver creature that can fly
resilient construct immune to bludgeoning damage
disk form creature that avoids opportunity attacks
creature that morphs into a disk and orb
